text: Hootalinqua was a territorial electoral district in the Canadian territory of Yukon, which was represented on the Yukon Territorial Council from 1974 to 1978 and in the Legislative Assembly of Yukon from 1978 to 1992. ==Representatives== {| border=1 cellpadding=5 cellspacing=0 |- bgcolor="CCCCCC" ! Parliament ! Years ! colspan="2" | Member ! Party |- | bgcolor="CCCCCC" | 1974 | 1974-1978 | | | Robert Fleming | Independent |- | bgcolor="CCCCCC" | 1978 | 1978–1982 | rowspan="4" | | rowspan="2" | Al Falle | rowspan="4" | |- | bgcolor="CCCCCC" | 1982 | 1982–1985 |- | bgcolor="CCCCCC" | 1985 | 1985–1989 | rowspan="2" | Willard Phelps |- | bgcolor="CCCCCC" | 1989 | 1989–1992 |} ==References== Category:Former Yukon territorial electoral districts
title: Hootalinqua (electoral district)
